events.message: I received my order yesterday but the blender is not working properly. It makes strange noises and stops randomly.
The issue has been classified under Product Defect after analyzing the customer complaint about the faulty blender.
Customer support representative Sarah has been assigned to handle the defective product report for this case.
Hello, I am sorry to hear that your blender is malfunctioning. I’m here to help you get this resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide details on when you first noticed the issue and if there are any visible damages or scratches on the product?
I noticed the problem on the very first use. There is a small scratch near the blender blade and it keeps stopping mid-use.
We can either send you a replacement blender or arrange for a repair service. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement as I need the blender urgently and don’t want to wait for repairs.
Your replacement blender has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours with expedited delivery.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement blender and that it is functioning properly.
Yes, I got the replacement and it works perfectly now. Thank you for the quick assistance!
Glad to hear your issue has been resolved. We are closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime in the future.
